testCase.name: handleDraft should set setIsConfirmOpen to false when called
handleDraft should call modifyProduct with isDraft set to true when process is "modify"
handleDraft should call createProduct with isDraft set to true when process is "create" or "clone"
handleDraft should not call any functions when process is undefined
handleDraft should not call any functions when productData is undefined
handleDraft should not call any functions when id is undefined
microfrontend bootstraps the app
microfrontend mounts and unmounts
IndexComponent renders
IndexComponent Changes values
IndexComponent Show modal when clicking save to Draft
IndexComponent Shows disabled button when form is not valid
IndexComponent Should not have disabled button when fom is valid
handleDetailsSuccess Works
FormComponeent Should render if step === 1
FormComponeent Should render if step === 2
FormComponeent Should render if step === 3
FormComponeent Should render if step === 4
FormComponeent Should render if step === 5
handleNext should call setStep when theres more steps ahead
handleNext should not setStep when there are no steps ahead
handlePrev should call setStep when there are steps behind
handlePrev should not call setStep when user is at the first step
handleDraft should set setIsConfirmOpen to false when called
handleDraft should call modifyProduct with isDraft set to true when process is "modify"
handleDraft should call createProduct with isDraft set to true when process is "create" or "clone"
handleDraft should not call any functions when process is undefined
Test App Component If App is rendered wihout issues
